__e: I don't know what the world is coming to anymore when a gay man, who was thinking of becoming a woman then decides on suicide, turns out to be the most normal member of the family.
So horrific that you forced him, against his will, to go under the knife, change his gender, to give you a daughter instead of your son who is gay.
You're going to get a sex-change operation and be a girl?
And if it's a boy like everyone seems to think, then that's great for the world, too, I suppose.
